content: m a p l e s e e d h a t dorian owen www fancytigercrafts com the maple seed hat is a dk weight crocheted hat designed for the 2022 yarn along the rockies yarn crawl it comes with three sizes and two color options single color or two color this design uses the spike stitch to create fun texture and movement throughout #mapleseedhat all rights reserved © 2022 fancy tiger crafts for personal use only maple seed hat sizes tools finished measurements s m l 18 21 24 4 5mm crochet hook s m l 18 21 24 circumference unstretched locking stitch marker circumference unstretched tapestry needle for weaving in ends materials 1 skein birch hollow fiber s phillis dk gauge 250yds/115g 14 rounds in pattern = 4 16dc = 4 abbreviations notes hat is worked top down with the right side rs facing you do not turn after each round chain chain it is not recommended to use the magic loop method to create the beginning ring slip_stitch slip_stitch beginning chains of each round do not count as stitches double_crochet double_crochet stitch counts are given in italics at the end of each round be sure your stitch counts are correct single_crochet single_crochet in the crown do not skip the stitches behind the spike stitches as this creates st/sts stitch/stitches the increases spike stitch spsc insert in the body and brim do skip the stitch behind the spike stitches hook into indicated stitch 2 take care to not make the spike stitches too tight as it may pucker the crochet fabric rounds below pull up a loop this pattern also works up well in 2 colors use color a for the odd numbered to height of current round double_crochet stitch rounds and color b for the even numbered spsc stitch rounds yarn over and pull through use color b for both rounds of the brim 2 loops www fancytigercrafts com 1 © fancy tiger crafts 2022 pattern crown do not skip stitches behind the spsc ch3 slip_stitch into first chain to join and form a ring round 1 ch2 does not count as a stitch here and throughout 7dc into ring slip_stitch to first double_crochet to join 6 7 8 double_crochet round 2 ch1 single_crochet in first double_crochet spsc into ring *single_crochet into st behind spsc spsc into ring repeat from * around slip_stitch in first single_crochet to join 6 7 8 single_crochet 6 7 8 spsc round 3 ch2 2dc in first st double_crochet in next st *2dc in next st double_crochet in next st repeat from * around slip_stitch in first double_crochet to join 18 21 24 double_crochet round 4 ch1 *single_crochet in 3 double_crochet spsc in spsc 2 rounds directly below repeat from * around slip_stitch in first single_crochet to join place marker in last spsc of round 18 21 24 single_crochet 6 7 8 spsc round 5 ch2 2dc in first st double_crochet in next 3 sts *2dc in next st round 13 repeat
